import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact-us', templateUrl: './contact-us.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-us.component.css'] }) export class ContactUsComponent { }

Get In Touch

Have questions about our gear? We're here to help!

Send Us a Message

Contact Information

Reach out to us through any of the following methods. We aim to respond within 24 business hours.

  • Address:
    123 Hardware, Construction, PH 1000
  • Phone:
    +63 917 123 4567
  • Email:

  • Hours:
    Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM PHT
